name: Astro-Adventure
description: Astro-Adventures follows the creation of spacestronaut-64, I have modified the levels including 3 different unique levels with different textures. I have also redesigned the level menu, along with the pause, victory, and end pages. Finally, I have created a boos level at the end of the game with increased health on the enemies and a unique design to get to the boded. Enjoy!
